titles.title: Northern Border Commerce Protection Act
To provide for the reinstatement of certain NAFTA Customs fees exemption, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 11/30/2011--Introduced. Northern Border Commerce Protection Act - Amends the Consolidated Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1985 to reinstate the exemption for Canada from the payment of customs user fees by arriving passengers whose journey originated in Canada or originated in the United States or a U.S. territory or possession and was limited to Canada.
